00053 void MSD_execNameTranslateElement(void)
00054 {
00055    char  name1[15];
00056    float tx, ty, tz;
00057 
00058    while (4 != sscanf(restbuf, "%s %f %f %f", name1, &tx, &ty, &tz))
00059    {
00060       printf("trans: name rx ry rz\n");
00061       if (!lineins("? "))
00062       {
00063          return;
00064       }
00065    }
00066    MSD_highNameTranslateElement(name1, tx, ty, tz);
00067 }
00068 
00069 int MSD_highNameTranslateElement(char *name, real tx, real ty, real tz)
00070 {
00071    switch (MSD_getTypeByName(name))
00072    {
00073        case 'o':
00074        return(MSD_highNameTranslate(name, tx, ty, tz));
00075 
00076        case 'g':
00077        return(MSD_highNameMoveGroup(name, tx, ty, tz));
00078 
00079        case 'a':
00080        return(MSD_highNameMoveAxis(name, tx, ty, tz));
00081    }
00082    return(FALSE);
00083 }
